descriptionHtml:
Septim HD

This is simply a HD replacement for the default Septim
without breaking default design. I did not create the
textures from scratch, I simply replaced the default
with higher res of the coin. I did however remake
the side of the coin to enhance the indentations
along the side of the coin. There is a small spot
in the texture I will have to fix, but for now this
will suffice.

See screenshots for Before & After

Default install uses Lower BPP No Mimaps

I created versions with and without Mipmaps, though
there should not be a problem using base install
this is simply a precaution to prevent have to
update for something other than an actual fix
to the textures themselves.

The differnces between base install and the
higher BPP versions is subtle.
author: Crypton
